title: smail
description: A free and open-source temporary email service
card_description: This is your temporary email, the email list refreshes every 10 seconds

features.title: Open-source
features.description: Our code is open-source, you can view it on GitHub.

features.title: Free
features.description: Our service is always free. No payment, no subscription.

features.title: Simple
features.description: Just one click, you can get a temporary email.

features.title: Self-hosted
features.description: You can deploy a smail service by yourself, just a few minutes.
